fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Visit someone to gift them canned foods.
- Once you complete your goal, at any time, you may choose to can the game immediately. People who have previously completed their goals will win, everyone else will lose.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Gifting someone canned foods heals them and permanently increases their defense tier.
- Gifting someone canned foods also reduces your defense tier.
- If your target now has Powerful or higher defense, they will automatically be redirected to you.
- If your target now has Invincible or higher defense, you will attack yourself.
- Piercing will always be one tier of attack higher than your defense.
- Defense tiers: Immortal -> Overprotective -> Invincible -> Powerful -> Basic -> None -> Vulnerable
- You are not control or redirect immune.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Decrease your defense to None, then survive to the end of the game.
